page.title: 09ST MAWGAN PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: We interviewed Mrs Pat Harvey chairperson of the parsh council. Mrs Harvey has been a councillor for eight years and sees the role of the councl as maintaining the existing facilites, making apprcaches to Restormel Borough Council and Cornwall county council on behalf of the parish The main responsibilities of the parish are footpaths ,bridlepaths, cemetary,consultation on planning activities and bulk refuse In her year as chairperson Mrs Harvey would like to establish close links with the German town of Wentorf. ST Mawgan's young people under the auspices of the church have already visited this town. She would also like to form closer links with the RAF. Mrs Harvey emphasised that they had little money.The main project is to improve the playing field drainage
